bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: Thumb exception enable bit

bitField.name: FA
bitField.description: This bit controls the Force AP functionality in the MMU that generates Access Bit faults.

bitField.name: TR
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: This is the Non-Maskable Fast Interrupt enable bit.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines how the E bit in the CPSR is set on an exception

bitField.name: VE
bitField.description: This bit enables the VIC interface to determine interrupt vectors.

bitField.name: XP
bitField.description: This bit enables extended page tables to be configured for the hardware page translation mechanism.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations, including mixed little/big endian operation

bitField.name: FI
bitField.description: FI

bitField.name: IT
bitField.description: This field is deprecated.

bitField.name: DT
bitField.description: This field is deprecated.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: This bit defines the location of exception vectors.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level

bitField.name: BPU
bitField.description: Enables the branch prediction unit

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: This bit enables data address alignment fault checking.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: Enables the MMU

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number or major revision of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_Part_Number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Product_Revision_Number
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number or minor revision of the processor

bitField.name: STATE3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment (ThumbEE).

bitField.name: STATE2
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle extension interface.

bitField.name: STATE1
bitField.description: Indicates the type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports.

bitField.name: STATE0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set.

bitField.name: Microcontroller_Programmers_Model
bitField.description: Indicates support for microcontroller programmer's model.

bitField.name: Security_Extensions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture v1.

bitField.name: Programmers_Model
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer's model

bitField.name: Microcontroller_Debug
bitField.description: Indicates support for the microcontroller debug model - memory-mapped.
Indicates support for the trace debug model - memory-mapped.
Indicates support for the coprocessor-based trace debug model - coprocessor.
Indicates support for the memory-mapped debug model.
Indicates support for the secure debug model - coprocessor.
Indicates support for the coprocessor debug model.

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for fast context switch memory mappings.

bitField.name: Auxiliary_Register_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for Auxiliary Control Register.

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA.

bitField.name: Outer_Shareable
bitField.description: Indicates support for outer shareable attribute.

bitField.name: Cache_Coherence_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency maintenance.

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Protected Memory System Architecture (PMSA).

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture (VMSA).

bitField.name: BTB
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch target buffer.

bitField.name: L1_DCache_Test_Clean
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_All_Maintenance_UA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_All_Maintenance_HA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_by_SA_Maintenance_UA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_by_SA_Maintenance_HA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_by_MVA_Maintenance_UA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Cache_by_MVA_Maintenance_HA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, Harvard architecture.
Indicates support for hardware access flag.

bitField.name: WFI
bitField.description: Indicates support for wait-for-interrupt stalling.
Indicates support for memory barrier operations.
Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture.
Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.
Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture.
Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.
Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.
Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations.
Indicates support for invalidate cache by set and way, clean by set and way, and invalidate and clean by set and way.
Indicates support for invalidate cache by MVA, clean by MVA, invalidate and clean by MVA, and invalidate all.

bitField.name: Divide_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for divide instructions.

bitField.name: Debug_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for debug instructions.

bitField.name: Coprocessor_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions. This field reads as zero (RAZ).

bitField.name: CMP_Branch_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions.

bitField.name: Bit_Field_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bitfield instructions.

bitField.name: Bit_Count_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions.

bitField.name: Atomic_Load_Store_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions.

bitField.name: Jazelle
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle instructions.

bitField.name: Interworking_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for instructions that branch between ARM and Thumb code.

bitField.name: Immediate_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for immediate instructions.

bitField.name: ITE_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for If-Then instructions.

bitField.name: Extend_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions.

bitField.name: Exception2
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 2 instructions.

bitField.name: Exception1
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 1 instructions.

bitField.name: Endianness
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions.

bitField.name: Reversal_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for reversal instructions.

bitField.name: PSR
bitField.description: Indicates support for PSR instructions.

bitField.name: Unsigned_Multiply_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Signed_Multiply_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Multiply_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Multi_Access_Interruptible_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions.

bitField.name: Memory_Hint_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions.

bitField.name: LDST_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for load and store instructions.

bitField.name: Thumb2EE_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb2 Executable Environment Extension instructions.

bitField.name: NOP_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions.

bitField.name: Thumb_Copy_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions.

bitField.name: Table_Branch_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions.

bitField.name: SYNC_PRIM_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions.

bitField.name: SVC_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC instructions.

bitField.name: SIMD_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions.

bitField.name: Saturate_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

bitField.name: PSR_M_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for PSR_M Instructions.

bitField.name: Synchronization_Primitives
bitField.description: Indicates fractional support for synchronization primitives.

bitField.name: Barrier_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for barrier instructions.

bitField.name: SMC
bitField.description: Indicates support for SMC instructions.

bitField.name: WriteBack_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for write-back instructions.

bitField.name: WithShift_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for with-shift instructions.

bitField.name: Unprivileged_Instructions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Unprivileged instructions.

bitField.name: L1_Parity_ON
bitField.description: Enables L1 cache parity checking.

bitField.name: L2EN
bitField.description: Enables L2 cache parity checking.

bitField.name: cp13
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP13 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp12
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP12 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp11
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP11 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp10
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP10 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp9
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP9 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp8
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP8 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp7
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP7 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp6
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP6 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp5
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP5 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp4
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP4 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp3
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP3 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp2
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP2 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp1
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP1 coprocessor.

bitField.name: cp0
bitField.description: Defines access permissions for the CP0 coprocessor.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Defines the operation of the processor

bitField.name: SUNIDEN
bitField.description: Enables secure User non-invasive debug

bitField.name: SUIDEN
bitField.description: Enables secure User invasive debug

bitField.name: TL
bitField.description: Determines if lockable translation table entries can be allocated in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CL
bitField.description: Determines if lockdown entries can be allocated within the L2 cache in Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP13
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP13 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP12
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP12 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP11
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP11 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP10
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP10 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP9
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP9 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP8
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP8 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP7
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP7 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP6
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP6 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP5
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP5 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP4
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP4 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP3
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP3 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP2
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP2 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP1
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP1 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: CP0
bitField.description: Determines permission to access the CP0 in the Non-secure state.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Indicates when an external abort is pending

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Indicates when an IRQ is pending

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates when an FIQ is pending

bitField.name: H
bitField.description: H

bitField.name: ILsize
bitField.description: Instruction lockable size specifies the number of instruction TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: DLsize
bitField.description: Data lockable size specifies the number of unified or data TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Unified specifies if the TLB is unified or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: This bit indicates the outer-shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk to shared memory.

bitField.name: OC
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: This bit indicates the outer-shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk to shared memory.

bitField.name: OC
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Table walk memory attribute.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable.

bitField.name: PD1
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 1. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: PD0
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 0. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See Status bits [3:0].

bitField.name: DOMAIN
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs. This field takes values 0-15.

bitField.name: STATUS
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. Determined by bits 10, 3:0.

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: STATUS
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. Determined by bits 10, 3:0.

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_D_ASID
register.description: Invalidate TLB entry on ASID match.

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_MVA
register.description: Invalidate TLB single entry by MVA.

bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Normal regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=0 for Normal regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Device regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=0 for Device regions
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x7
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x6
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x5
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x4
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x3
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x2
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x1
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x0
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b110
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b110
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: This field specifies the entry in the lockdown region where a subsequent hardware page table walk can place a TLB entry.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: This field sets whether the slot should be locked or unlocked.

bitField.name: PID
bitField.description: Provides the Process ID for fast context switch memory mappings

bitField.name: Context_ID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID

register.name: USER_RW_ID
register.description: User read/write thread and process ID register

register.name: USER_RO_ID
register.description: User read-only thread and process ID register

register.name: PRIVILEGED_ID
register.description: User privileged only thread and process ID register

bitField.name: Index
bitField.description: Selects the lockdown entry to read/write when accessing TLB lockdown access registers

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual Address

bitField.name: G
bitField.description: Global

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: ASID

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Holds the physical address of this page table entry

bitField.name: NSA
bitField.description: Secure or non-secure memory region

bitField.name: NSTID
bitField.description: Secure or non-secure page table entry

bitField.name: SIZE
bitField.description: Size of memory region

bitField.name: APX
bitField.description: Access permissions for page table entry

bitField.name: AP
bitField.description: Access permissions or first sub-page permissions.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Indicates if this page table entry is valid

bitField.name: AP3
bitField.description: Fourth Sub-Page Access Permission

bitField.name: AP2
bitField.description: Third Sub-Page Access Permission

bitField.name: AP1
bitField.description: Second Sub-Page Access Permission

bitField.name: SVP
bitField.description: Sub-Page Valid

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Domain number for the page table entry

bitField.name: XN
bitField.description: Execute Never Attribute

bitField.name: TEX
bitField.description: Memory region type and cacheable properties for this page table entry

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Memory region type and cacheable properties for this page table entry

bitField.name: B
bitField.description: Memory region type and cacheable properties for this page table entry

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates if this page table entry is valid

bitField.name: Format
bitField.description: 0x4 = Indicates that the Cache Type Register follows the ARMv7 format.

bitField.name: DMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 data cache.

bitField.name: L1_Ipolicy
bitField.description: PIPT instruction cache support.

bitField.name: IMinLine
bitField.description: Number of words of smallest line length in L1 or L2 instruction cache.

bitField.name: WT
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-through.

bitField.name: WB
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write-back.

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for read allocation.

bitField.name: WA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write allocation.

bitField.name: NumSets
bitField.description: Indicates number of sets - 1.

bitField.name: Associativity
bitField.description: Indicates number of ways - 1.

bitField.name: LineSize
bitField.description: Indicates (log2(number of words in cache line)) - 2.

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level selected

bitField.name: InD
bitField.description: Instruction or Data/Unified.

bitField.name: LoU
bitField.description: Level of unification

bitField.name: LoC
bitField.description: Level of coherency

bitField.name: CL8
bitField.description: Indicates cache at Cache Level (CL) 8

bitField.name: CL7
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 7

bitField.name: CL6
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 6

bitField.name: CL5
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 5

bitField.name: CL4
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 4

bitField.name: CL3
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 3

bitField.name: CL2
bitField.description: Indicates cache at CL 2

bitField.name: CL1
bitField.description: Indicates separate instruction and data cache at CL 1

register.name: INV_INSTR_CACHE
register.description: Invalidate entire instruction cache to PoU

register.name: INV_INSTR_CACHE_LINE_BY_MVA
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache line by MVA to PoU

bitField.name: MVA
bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate

register.name: FLUSH_BRANCH_TARGET_CACHE_ENTRY_BY_MVA
register.description: Invalidate MVA from branch predictor array

bitField.name: MVA
bitField.description: This field specifies the address to flush.

register.name: INV_DATA_CACHE_LINE_BY_MVA

bitField.description: Specifies address to invalidate

register.name: INV_DATA_CACHE_LINE_BY_WAY
register.description: Invalidate data cache line using Index

register.name: DATA_WRITE_BARRIER

bitField.name: MVA

register.name: CLEAN_INV_DATA_CACHE_LINE_BY_MVA

bitField.name: Level

bitField.name: euUnc

bitField.name: LOCK_way_7
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 7 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_6
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 6 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_5
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 5 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_4
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 4 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_3
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 3 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_2
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 2 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_1
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 1 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: Lock_Way_0
bitField.description: Lockdown bit for way 0 of the L2 cache

bitField.name: ECC
bitField.description: L2 ECC enable

bitField.name: L2_Inner
bitField.description: Defines whether the L2 observes the inner or outer cacheability attributes

bitField.name: Way7
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 7

bitField.name: Way6
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 6

bitField.name: Way5
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 5

bitField.name: Way4
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 4

bitField.name: Way3
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 3

bitField.name: Way2
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 2

bitField.name: Way1
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 1

bitField.name: Way0
bitField.description: Lock bit for data cache way 0

bitField.name: Way3
bitField.description: Lock bit for instruction cache way 3

bitField.name: Way2
bitField.description: Lock bit for instruction cache way 2

bitField.name: Way1
bitField.description: Lock bit for instruction cache way 1

bitField.name: Way0
bitField.description: Lock bit for instruction cache way 0

bitField.name: IMP
bitField.description: Specifies the implementor code.

bitField.name: IDCODE
bitField.description: Specifies the identification code.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the number of counters implemented.

bitField.name: DP
bitField.description: Disables cycle counter, CCNT, when non-invasive debug is prohibited.

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enables export of the events from the event bus to an external monitoring block, such as the ETM to trace events.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Cycle count divider: 0 = counts every processor clock cycle.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets cycle counter, CCNT, to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Performance counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets all performance counters to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enable bit: 0 = disables all counters, including CCNT 1 = enables all counters including CCNT.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Enable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Enable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Enable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Enable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Enable Counter 0.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Disable cycle counter.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Disable Counter 3.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Disable Counter 2.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Disable Counter 1.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Disable Counter 0.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle counter overflow flag.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Counter 3 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Counter 2 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Counter 1 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Counter 0 overflow flag.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: Increment Counter 3

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Increment Counter 2

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Increment Counter 1

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Increment Counter 0

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Counter select.

bitField.name: SEL
bitField.description: Specifies the event selected

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: User mode enable

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable.

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: CCNT overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P3
bitField.description: PMCNT3 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: PMCNT2 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: PMCNT1 overflow interrupt enable

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: PMCNT0 overflow interrupt enable

register_group.name: VA_TO_PA
register_group.description: Virtual Address to Physical Address translation

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Not used in the processor.

bitField.name: SH
bitField.description: Indicates shareable memory: 0 = non-shared 1 = shared.

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table.
Indicates that the translation succeeded. 0=Translation successful.

bitField.name: FSR
bitField.description: Holds the FSR bits for the aborted address.

register.name: VA_CW_PRIV_READ
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged read permission.

register.name: VA_CW_PRIV_WRITE
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with privileged write permission.

register.name: VA_CW_USER_READ
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User read permission.

register.name: VA_CW_USER_WRITE
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Current World with User write permission.

register.name: VA_OW_PRIV_READ
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged read permission.

register.name: VA_OW_PRIV_WRITE
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with privileged write permission.

register.name: VA_OW_USER_READ
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User read permission.

register.name: VA_OW_USER_WRITE
register.description: VA-to-PA translation in the Other World with User write permission.

register_group.name: TCM
register_group.description: Tightly Coupled Memory Configuration and Control

register_group.name: Non_Secure
register_group.description: CP15 Registers that are banked in Non Secure Mode

register.name: N_CACHE_SIZE_SELECT
register.description: Non-secure World cache size selection register

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level selected

bitField.name: InD
bitField.description: Instruction or Data/Unified.

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: Thumb exception enable bit.

bitField.name: FA
bitField.description: This bit controls the Force AP functionality in the MMU that generates Access Bit faults.

bitField.name: TR
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: This is the Non-Maskable Fast Interrupt enable bit.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines how the E bit in the CPSR is set on an exception.

bitField.name: VE
bitField.description: This bit enables the VIC interface to determine interrupt vectors.

bitField.name: XP
bitField.description: This bit enables extended page tables to be configured for the hardware page translation mechanism.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations, including mixed little/big endian operation.

bitField.name: FI
bitField.description: FI

bitField.name: IT
bitField.description: This field is deprecated.

bitField.name: DT
bitField.description: This field is deprecated.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: This bit defines the location of exception vectors.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: BPU
bitField.description: Enables the branch prediction unit.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: This bit enables data address alignment fault checking.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: Enables the MMU.

bitField.name: L1PE
bitField.description: Enables L1 cache parity checking.

bitField.name: L2EN
bitField.description: Enables L2 cache parity checking.

register.name: N_TTBR0
register.description: Non-secure World translation table base register 0

bitField.name: Translation_table_base_0
bitField.description: Holds the translation table base address, the physical address of the first level translation table.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: This bit indicates the outer-shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk to shared memory.

bitField.name: OC
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable.

register.name: N_TTBR1
register.description: Non-secure World translation table base register 1

bitField.name: Translation_table_base_0
bitField.description: Holds the translation table base address, the physical address of the first level translation table.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: This bit indicates the outer-shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk to shared memory.

bitField.name: OC
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Table walk memory attribute.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner non-cacheable.

register.name: N_TTBC
register.description: Non-secure World translation table base control register

bitField.name: PD1
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 1. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: PD0
bitField.description: Specifies occurrence of a translation table walk on a TLB miss when using Translation Table Base Register 0. When translation table walk is disabled, a section translation fault occurs instead on a TLB miss.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

register.name: N_DACR
register.description: Non-secure World domain access control register

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

register.name: N_DFSR
register.description: Non-secure World data fault status register

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See Status bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs. This field takes values 0-15.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. Determined by bits 10, 3:0.

register.name: N_IFSR
register.description: Non-secure World instruction fault status register

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: Indicates whether an AXI Decode or Slave error caused an abort. This bit is only valid for external aborts. For all other aborts this bit Should-Be-Zero.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Part of the Status field. See bits [3:0].

bitField.name: STATUS
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. Determined by bits 10, 3:0.

register.name: N_DATA_AUX_FAULT
register.description: Non-secure World data auxiliary fault status register

register.name: N_INSTR_AUX_FAULT
register.description: Non-secure World instruction auxiliary fault status register

register.name: N_DFAR
register.description: Non-secure World data fault address register

register.name: N_IFAR
register.description: Non-secure World instruction fault address register

register.name: N_TLB_INVALIDATE_ALL
register.description: Non-secure World invalidate TLB all unlocked entries.

register.name: N_TLB_INVALIDATE_MVA
register.description: Non-secure World invalidate TLB single entry by MVA.

register.name: N_TLB_INVALIDATE_ASID
register.description: Non-secure World invalidate TLB entry on ASID match.

register.name: N_PRIM_REGION_REMAP
register.description: Non-secure World primary region remap register

bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Normal regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=0 for Normal regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Device regions
Remaps shareable attribute when S=0 for Device regions
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x7
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x6
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x5
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x4
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x3
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x2
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x1
Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = 0x0

register.name: N_NORM_MEM_REMAP
register.description: Non-secure World normal memory remap register

bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b110
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001
Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b110
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001
Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000

bitField.name: PID
bitField.description: Provides the Process ID for fast context switch memory mappings

bitField.name: Context_ID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID

register.name: N_USER_RW_ID
register.description: Non-secure World User read/write thread and process ID register

register.name: N_USER_RO_ID
register.description: Non-secure World User read-only thread and process ID register

register.name: N_PRIVILEGED_ID
register.description: Non-secure World User privileged only thread and process ID register

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation.

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Not used in the processor.

bitField.name: SH
bitField.description: Indicates shareable memory: 0 = non-shared 1 = shared.

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table.

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table.
Indicates that the translation succeeded. 0=Translation successful.

bitField.name: FSR
bitField.description: Holds the FSR bits for the aborted address.
